citations.desc: Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers.
citations.narrative:
** No dealer shall knowingly obtain any dog from any person who is not licensed, without obtaining a certificate that the
animals were born and raised on that person's premises and if for pets, that person does not have more than four
breeding females.
The facility purchased a female miniature Schnauzer on or around 10 Aug 2025 from an unlicensed source and did not
obtain a certification statement that the seller was not required to be licensed with the USDA. The facility must obtain a
certification statement every time they obtain a regulated animal from an unlicensed source. To be corrected: from this
day forward; 06 Jan 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.132(d) 
   
Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers. 
** No dealer shall knowingly obtain any dog from any person who is not licensed, without obtaining a certificate that the 
animals were born and raised on that person's premises and if for pets, that person does not have more than four 
breeding females. 
The facility purchased a female miniature Schnauzer on or around 10 Aug 2025 from an unlicensed source and did not 
obtain a certification statement that the seller was not required to be licensed with the USDA. The facility must obtain a 
certification statement every time they obtain a regulated animal from an unlicensed source. To be corrected: from this 
day forward; 06 Jan 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
